column1: 1943 March 31st Note says gauge moved to Victoria Recreation Ground
The name at the top of the sheet says change happened in 1946
A note below says that it is more likely the move happened in 1943
Miss Morey, the observer died in 1943, so most likely that is when the move happened
Rec Ground about 300yrds W of Carisbrooke Rd
Ground slopes sharply to S nearby but no better site
1957 Station terminated, due to expense. No one willing to take over obs
